title: Update libwebp to latest version
body:
## Background

Originally reported in #3055 (now closed, split into separate issues).

<sup>Originally posted by **jeremy-bridges** November 5, 2024</sup>

Many vulnerabilities are flagged by Black Duck for libwebp. Please update to reduce the security vulnerability profile of SkiaSharp.

![libwebp vulnerabilities](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/063fceb6-d0d0-4e53-81e1-7d256f594102)

## Current Status

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Current version | 1.3.2 |
| Target version | 1.6.0 |
| PR | #3461 |

## Changes in libwebp 1.4.0 - 1.6.0

- Security hardening and increased fuzzing coverage
- Additional AVX2, SSE2 optimizations (AVX2 disabled for now, see #3464)
- Fix heap overflow in webpmux
- Lossless encoder improvements
- Various bug and warning fixes

## Related

- PR #3461 - Update libwebp to 1.6.0
- Issue #3464 - Enable AVX2 optimizations (follow-up)
- Discussion #3053 - Original report

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

The label backend/SkiaSharp will be applied due to the issue focusing on updating the libwebp library to reduce vulnerabilities related to SkiaSharp.

This issue is not classified as a regression.

Additional remarks:
* No suitable labels were found that directly match the content of the issue, as it addresses the update of a library for security vulnerabilities without specific operating system context.
* The issue involves updating the libwebp library, which is related to dependencies rather than directly aligning with available label categories.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- The issue addresses vulnerabilities linked to the SkiaSharp library through the need to update the libwebp library.
- The focus is on security improvements rather than specific implementations of SkiaSharp or HarfBuzz.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action      | Item              | Description                                                                                   |
| :---------- | :---------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Apply Label | backend/SkiaSharp | The issue is centered around updating the libwebp library to mitigate vulnerabilities specific to SkiaSharp. |

</details>



_This entire triage process was automated by AI and mistakes may have been made. Please let us know so we can continue to improve._
